dict.acceptation: 成员；分子；身体部位（尤指胳膊或腿）；构件，部件；

sent.orig: Returns the simple name of the underlying member or constructor represented by this Member.
sent.trans: 返回该Member代表的成员或构造函数的简单名称。

sent.orig: An owner is one particular member of a Plone site.
sent.trans: 所有者(anowner)是Plone站点中特殊的成员(member)。

sent.orig: There are three classes of membership: corporate member, fellow member, and investor associate member.
sent.trans: 会员分三大类别：公司会员、专业会员、及投资者会员。

sent.orig: Plain the member that bright ginseng association has individual member and round experience 1548.
sent.trans: 川明参协会有个人会员和团体会员1548名。

sent.orig: The committee elected its first Asian member in 1908 and its first African member in 1910.
sent.trans: 委员会选举产生了第一个亚洲成员在1908年和其第一次非洲成员国于1910年。
